page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My alarm goes off at 7.30a.m. and I get up out of my bed and have a wash and clean my teeth.Then I put my school uniform on and go down for my breakfast which is a cup of tea.Then I go for the newspaper.At 8.45a.m. I set off for school.My dinner-time is spent at school.School finishes at 3.45p.m. When I get home I have my tea and then watch television for a couple of hours.After that my evening is spent playing sports.My favourite sports are football and cricket,which I play on Lamberhead Green school fields.I then have my supper which is normally just a light snack of toast and biscuits.I usually eat this while watching television.I frequently read for an hour in bed before going to sleep. { {(ACCOUNT OF A 13 YEAR OLD BOY)
